Kind Science Gentle Cleanser, Brightens + Balances

Brand: Kind Science

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Sodium Chloride, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopherol, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Ext

dinandiana Fruit Extract, Honey Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Aspalathus Linearis Extract, Boswellia Serrata Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Ethy

arch Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Allantoin, Tetrapeptide-14, Butylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
